attributes.review:
I downloaded this W O N D E R F U L L app to support our W O N D E R F U L L president! When I opened the app I saw a deceased mole rat that was starting to rot! â€œEw!â€ Is what I initially thought, until I took a second glance and saw it was just our W O N D E R F U L L president! Silly me! It was not in-fact a deceased mole rat that was starting to rot, but was rather our W O N D E R F U L L president that does not know how to do his job! TeeHEE! To support our W O N D E R F U L L president I put a banner of him in my front yard! It was such a W O N D E R F U L L banner! I had kept the banner up for several days until one of my neighbors had saw it and asked my why I had a banner of a deceased mole rat that was starting to rot in my front yard. I told them they should give it a second glance because it was not a banner of a deceased mole rat that was starting to rot and in-fact it was a picture of our W O N D E R F U L L president! They told me to give it a second glance because apparently it was what I had originally thought our president was! I looked it up and down before realizing, they were right! Silly me! I had accidentally bought a banner of a deceased mole rat that was starting to rot and not our W O N D E R F U L president! They had thought I was trying to mock our president, so they burnt down my house because no one that supports trump can handle and other opinions! This is why Trump=Sexist/racist/misogynistic/bigoted/an-noying energy!

i am nagito komaeda
i cant take this i am nagito komaeda in the flesh, bones, and blood. no one else is me, they are just "factkins," nothing more. there is literally no one that exists in this dimension that is more me than ME. i am me. i am komaeda. youre not. your friend is not. your crush is not. thats me. sure, they kin komaeda/ but they are not komaeda. i am not a komaeda kin. i AM nagito komaeda. factkin me all you want but you ARE NOT ME. WHY WOULD U EVEN THINK YOURE ME IM ME HOW MANY TIMES DO I HAVE TO SAY THIS ITS NOT EVEN A GOOD THING TO BE ME. LIKE BY NOT BEING KOMAEDA THAT MAKES YOU 10000% MORE VALID OF A PERSON OVERALL. YOU ARE NOT ME. I AM. IT DOESNT EEN MAKE SENSE TO BE ME BECAUSE IM RIGHT FRICKING HERE. EVERYTHING about komaeda is the same about me that is literally me in BOTH this life and the past life and one day i will be reincarnated and in THAT life i will know exactly who i am. i cant take this i cant take people thinking thzy are me i cant take people thinking other people ARE ME BECAUDE TGET ARE NOT. IM ME. im literally me. im literally komaeda. nagito komaeda in the flesh. stop kinning me YOURE LITERALLY ONLY DEGRADING URSELF BY KINNING ME IS IT TO BE EDGY OR DO YOU JUST HATE YOURSELF? one day im going to prove it and you'll all fricking see holy cap. attributes.review: So I downloaded this a day ago and ever since then, my dog has been acting out. Throughout the day he has been sticking random decals on the walls of my house, and doing the box challenge when he thinks Iâ€™m not looking.Ofc like any functioning person, I thought nothing of it other than the dog race becoming more advanced. All up until 12:32 am last night where he came in standing like a human and told me â€œdelete the appâ€. I was so confused, what app? And so I tore through my phone trying to find the app that was making both him (and possibly me) delirious. Thankfully this is the first app I deleted and everything went back the the second before I was going to download it. I got the chance to reconsider, but sadly the rewind in hours didnâ€™t take away the mess that he made. While Iâ€™m cleaning this up I would j like to say I canâ€™t believe the App Store would let something this unruly be easily accessible. Plz ban it, I would hate for anyone to go through what I just went through
